github.com.username-rules: minlength: 1; maxlength: 39; allowed: lower, digit, special; start-with: lower;

twitter.com.username-rules: minlength: 1; maxlength: 15; allowed: lower, digit, special; start-with: lower;

example.com.username-rules: minlength: 5; maxlength: 20; required: lower, digit; allowed: lower, digit, special; start-with: lower; end-with: lower
